column2: BRIEF-Simpson Manufacturing Q1 Sales $244.8 Million April 30 (Reuters) - Simpson Manufacturing Co Inc: * SIMPSON MANUFACTURING CO., INC. ANNOUNCES 2018 FIRST QUARTER FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q1 SALES $244.8 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $237.6 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.48 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * REITERATING FINANCIAL TARGETS AND ASSUMPTIONS UNDER COMPANY’S “2020 PLAN” * SIMPSON MANUFACTURING - CURRENTLY BELIEVES, DUE TO UNCERTAINTY RELATED TO STEEL TARIFFS, MARKET PRICE FOR STEEL WILL CONTINUE TO INCREASE DURING Q2 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Simpson Manufacturing Reports Q1 EPS Of $0.54 April 30 (Reuters) - Simpson Manufacturing Co Inc: * 2018 Q1 NET SALES OF $244.8 MILLION INCREASED 11% YEAR-OVER-YEAR * REITERATING FINANCIAL TARGETS AND ASSUMPTIONS UNDER COMPANY’S “2020 PLAN” * SIMPSON MANUFACTURING - BELIEVES, DUE TO UNCERTAINTY RELATED TO STEEL TARIFFS, MARKET PRICE FOR STEEL TO LIKELY CONTINUE TO INCREASE DURING Q2 * SIMPSON MANUFACTURING - CO BELIEVES, DUE TO UNCERTAINTY RELATED TO STEEL TARIFFS, MARKET PRICE FOR STEEL TO LIKELY CONTINUE TO INCREASE DURING Q2 Source text:(bit.ly/2I1TpmW) Further company coverage:
